name: Léonard Pouget
label: Full Stack Data Scientist
summary: Full-stack Data Scientist and Team Lead specializing in end-to-end project deployment within the marketing domain. From SQL preprocessing to Metaflow orchestration on AWS, I build robust systems that transform customer behavioral data into strategic clarity for executive leadership.

highlights_tech: Proficiency in SQL (Redshift) on a day-to-day basis for analytics purposes.
Creation of data tools in Python focus on Marketing Science and Customer Knowledge.
Development of ambitious Data Science initiatives from initial business problematics to model industrialization using Metaflow.
Some libraries I have worked with: causalpy, pymc-marketing, google-meridian, librecommender, tensorflow-recommenders
Established the technical and structural norms for the Data Science team: git, implementation of coding best practices, linting, formatting, code review.
Upskilled on cloud environment (AWS) principles and tools: Docker, ECS, Step Functions, S3, etc.
highlights_biz: Lead the Data Science & Analytics team.
Lead the development of Data Science initiatives oriented around Marketing Science: Incrementality testing, Multi-touch Attribution, Marketing Mix Modeling, Synthetic Controls.
Participated in the construction of the 360° view of our customer knowledge.
Managed a team of 2 Data Scientists.
Initiated the development of the DS platform.

highlights_tech: Developed a speciality in Dataiku. Organized training sessions internally as well as for different clients.
Adapted my professional skills to match the client's environment: Pyspark for data processing, Dataiku for modelisation, R (Shiny) for visualisation.
highlights_biz: Worked in the following industries: Retail, Cosmetic, Luxury Goods
Data Scientist consultant in a variety of topics and analyses.
Scoring model along the customer life cycle: Churn prediction, repurchase propensity, reactivation score.
Development of both static and interactive reports (R Shiny).
Ad hoc studies on omnicanality, customer behavior, commercial pressure optimization.

projects.title: Neural Style Transfer API
projects.summary: A deep learning project deployed via FastAPI.

education.degree: Senior year Bachelor in Economics & Statistics
